properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , FOOD_INTEREST , CLEAN_INTEREST) VALUES(SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = '123456789@' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME= ? ,GENDER= ? ,PHONE= ? ,EMAIL= ? ,ADDRESS= ? ,FOOD_INTEREST= ? ,CLEAN_INTEREST= ? WHERE USER_ID= ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID= ? AND STATUS= 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS= 'N' WHERE USER_PWD= ? AND USER_NO= ? AND STATUS= 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID= ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET FOOD_INTEREST= ? ,CLEAN_INTEREST= ? WHERE USER_ID= ?
